WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF

Total Building Technologies

Shop Now
 
 
 
 
Homepage Contact

Thank you!

What We Do

Building Efficiency Solutions

Building Security Solutions

Building Health Solutions

Building Monitoring Solutions

Building HVAC Solutions

Building Lighting Solutions

Our Purpose:
Retrofitting Buildings to Save the Planet

Buildings consume a disproportionate amount of energy. At Jackson Control, we focus on the achievable cost reductions when retrofitting buildings to make them more sustainable and efficient. We help property owners, facility managers, and contractors achieve ESG goals related to environmental efficiency and sustainability. We deliver a standardized Niagara open platform that incorporates HVAC, Security, Lighting, Indoor Air Quality & Water Conservation.

An estimated 34 million

Buildings in the US

and on average Americans spend 90 % of their time indoors.

 

Less than 1 million

Buildings are upgraded to an Open Platform

and eventually all buildings will need to be upgraded to an open smart building.

 
 

We’re Upgrading 250 million

SQFT of Medical Office Buildings to Open Platform

A smart building upgrade will save 30-35% on energy.

 

Our Partners

Technology is ever-changing. Jackson Control partners with the brands that steer innovation within their respective markets. This gives us the opportunity to provide the best solutions that target your specific facility challenges. Jackson Control is the premier one-stop shop for all building technologies. Shop Now

Meet Our Team

                Who We Are
              

              
                Jackson Control is a high-value-add building technologies distributor & systems integrator providing world-class products and a technology platform that delivers healthy, efficient, and secure building environments. Our objective is to serve as your trusted advisor and provide you with the ultimate open platform, best-in-class solution.

  Our Purpose:Retrofitting Buildings to Save the PlanetBuildings consume a disproportionate amount of energy. At Jackson Control, we focus on the achievable cost reductions when retrofitting buildings to make them more sustainable and efficient. We help property owners, facility managers, and contractors achieve ESG goals related to environmental efficiency and sustainability. We deliver a standardized Niagara open platform that incorporates HVAC, Security, Lighting, Indoor Air Quality & Water Conservation.





















  
  






  An estimated 34 millionBuildings in the USand on average Americans spend 90 % of their time indoors.





















  
  



 


  Less than 1 millionBuildings are upgraded to an Open Platformand eventually all buildings will need to be upgraded to an open smart building.





















  
  



  


  We’re Upgrading 250 millionSQFT of Medical Office Buildings to Open PlatformA smart building upgrade will save 30-35% on energy.





















  
  



 
        
        
          
        
      

    

  

    

      
        
        
          


  Our PartnersTechnology is ever-changing. Jackson Control partners with the brands that steer innovation within their respective markets. This gives us the opportunity to provide the best solutions that target your specific facility challenges.  Jackson Control is the premier one-stop shop for all building technologies. Shop Now
